mapper.insert: insert into journalism(jtitle, jabstract, jtext, jauthor, jtime, jyear, jmonth, jday,jliulan,jstatue,jtype) values (#{jtitle},#{jabstract},#{jtext},#{jauthor},#{jtime},#{jyear},#{jmonth},#{jday},#{jliulan},1,#{jtype})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from shopinfo
and sname like CONCAT('%','${sname}','%')
mapper.update: update journalism set jstatue=#{statue} where jid=#{jid}
